translations: 想起，思考（bethink 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Presently he bethought him of a treasure he had and got it out.
sentences.translation: 不一会儿，他想起了他的一个宝贝，就把它拿了出来。

sentences.sentence: I bethought myself a mo we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao .
John has bethought himself of studying law.
